00030 FXDEFMAP(RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow) XIdentWindowMap[]={
00031   //____Message_Type_____________ID_______________Message_Handler_______
00032   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::ID_NYI, RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::onNotYetImplemented),
00033   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::ID_HELP_ABOUT, RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::onHelpAbout),
00034   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::ID_TOOL_ACCOUNT, RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::onManageAccount),
00035   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::ID_TOOL_SERVER, RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::onManageServer),
00036 
00037 
00038 };

00040 FXIMPLEMENT(RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow,FXMainWindow,XIdentWindowMap,ARRAYNUMBER(XIdentWindowMap));

00048 RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::XIdentWindow(FXApp * a)
00049    :FXMainWindow(a,"RainbruRPG Xident",NULL,NULL,DECOR_ALL,0,0,800,600){
00050 
00051   // We start with an incremental panel identifier at 0
00052   switcherChildId=0;
00053 
00054   FXint opt= BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH;
00055 
00056   // frame containing admin info and button
00057   FXVerticalFrame *frame = new FXVerticalFrame(this, LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00058 
00059 
00060   // Menubar
00061   FXMenuBar * menubar = new FXMenuBar(frame,LAYOUT_SIDE_TOP|LAYOUT_FILL_X|FRAME_RAISED);
00062 
00063   filemenu = new FXMenuPane(this);
00064   new FXMenuCommand(filemenu,"&Quit\tCtl-Q\tQuit the application.",
00065                     NULL,getApp(),FXApp::ID_QUIT);
00066 
00067   toolmenu = new FXMenuPane(this);
00068   new FXMenuCommand(toolmenu,"&Accounts\tCtl-A\t"
00069                     "Creates, deletes and manages accounts.",
00070                     NULL,this,ID_TOOL_ACCOUNT);
00071   new FXMenuCommand(toolmenu,"&Servers\tCtl-A\t"
00072                     "Creates, deletes and manages servers.",
00073                     NULL,this,ID_TOOL_SERVER);
00074 
00075   helpmenu = new FXMenuPane(this);
00076   new FXMenuCommand(helpmenu,"About x&Ident\tCtl-I\t"
00077                     "Primary informations about xident.",NULL,this,
00078                     ID_HELP_ABOUT);
00079 
00080   new FXMenuTitle(menubar,"&File",NULL,filemenu);
00081   new FXMenuTitle(menubar,"&Manage",NULL,toolmenu);
00082   new FXMenuTitle(menubar,"&Help",NULL,helpmenu,  
00083                   FX::LAYOUT_RIGHT| FX::LAYOUT_TOP);
00084 
00085 
00086   // Matric containing Admin info
00087   FXHorizontalFrame* frMatrix=new FXHorizontalFrame(frame, LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00088 
00089   // Admin info
00090   FXLabel* labAdminName=new FXLabel(frMatrix, "Admin :");
00091   FXTextField* tfAdminName=new FXTextField (frMatrix, 20 );
00092   FXLabel* labAdminPwd=new FXLabel(frMatrix, "Password :");
00093   FXTextField* tfAdminPwd=new FXTextField (frMatrix, 20 );
00094 
00095   // The FXSwitcher
00096   switcher=new FXSwitcher(frame,LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00097   // The Label panel
00098   FXLabel* labHelp=new  FXLabel(switcher, 
00099     "Welcome to RainbruRPG xident tool.\n\n" 
00100     "It is used to manage admin-website datas of the game.\n"
00101     "You can start working with a menu bar option.");
00102   panelHelpId=switcherChildId++;
00103 
00104   // The panels
00105   FoxAccountList* fal=new FoxAccountList(switcher);
00106   panelAccountId=switcherChildId++;
00107   FoxServerList* fsl=new FoxServerList(switcher);
00108   panelServerId=switcherChildId++;
00109 
00110   // The status bar
00111   FXStatusBar* sb=new FXStatusBar (frame, LAYOUT_FILL_X|
00112                                    STATUSBAR_WITH_DRAGCORNER);
00113 
00114 
00115 }

00121 RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::~XIdentWindow(){
00122   delete filemenu;
00123   delete helpmenu;
00124   delete toolmenu;
00125   delete switcher;
00126 }

00134 void RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::create(){
00135    FXMainWindow::create();
00136    show();

00150 long RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::
00151 onHelpAbout(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00152   LOGI("Help::About called");
00153 
00154   FXMessageBox::information(this, FX::MBOX_OK, "About xIdent", 
00155             "A tools used to managed the RainbruRPG administration website "
00156                             "files");
00157 
00158   return 1;
00159 }

00171 long RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::
00172 onNotYetImplemented(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00173   LOGW("Not yet implemented");
00174   return 1;
00175 }

00187 long RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::
00188 onManageAccount(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00189   LOGI("onManageAccount called");
00190   switcher->setCurrent(panelAccountId, true);
00191   return 1;
00192 }

00204 long RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::
00205 onManageServer(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00206   LOGI("onManageServer called");
00207   switcher->setCurrent(panelServerId, true);
00208   return 1;
